com.netflix.fenzo

Class DefaultFitnessCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.fenzo.DefaultFitnessCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VMTaskFitnessCalculator

    public class DefaultFitnessCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements VMTaskFitnessCalculator
    A default fitness calculator that always finds any target to be perfectly fit for any task. A fitness calculator computes * a value between 0.0 and 1.0 to indicate the confidence with which it believes a particular target is suitable for a particular task, with 0.0 signifying that it is completely unconfident, and 1.0 signifying that it is completely confident. This default fitness calculator always computes this value to be 1.0, meaning that it always believes a target and a task are well matched for each other.
